name: awsflow
description: Let AI access AWS services and work for you

languageModelTools.name: TestAwsConnectionTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Tests AWS connectivity using STS GetCallerIdentity. Returns true if the connection is successful.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Test your AWS connectivity with current session credentials

region.description: The AWS region to test. If not specified, uses the current session region.

languageModelTools.name: SessionTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Get or set AWS session values (AwsProfile, AwsEndPoint, AwsRegion), list available profiles, or refresh cached credentials. Use GetSession to read current values. Use SetSession with params to update any of AwsProfile, AwsEndPoint, AwsRegion. Use ListProfiles to return profile names detected from AWS config/credentials files. Use RefreshCredentials to clear and reload cached credentials.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage session (profile/region/endpoint), list profiles, refresh credentials

command.description: Use GetSession to read current values. Use SetSession to update session values. Use ListProfiles to retrieve available profile names. Use RefreshCredentials to clear and reload cached credentials.

params.description: Parameters for SetSession. Omit to leave unchanged.

AwsProfile.description: AWS profile name to set (Used by: SetSession)

AwsEndPoint.description: Custom AWS/S3-compatible endpoint to set (Used by: SetSession)

AwsRegion.description: AWS region to set (Used by: SetSession)

languageModelTools.name: STSTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS STS (Security Token Service) commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: GetCallerIdentity {command:'GetCallerIdentity', params:{}}. GetAccessKeyInfo {command:'GetAccessKeyInfo', params:{AccessKeyId:'AKIA...'}}. GetSessionToken {command:'GetSessionToken', params:{DurationSeconds:3600}}. GetFederationToken {command:'GetFederationToken', params:{Name:'session-name'}}. GetWebIdentityToken {command:'GetWebIdentityToken', params:{RoleArn:'arn:aws:iam::...', RoleSessionName:'session', WebIdentityToken:'token'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get temporary security credentials and caller identity information from AWS STS

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

AccessKeyId.description: AWS access key ID (Used by: GetAccessKeyInfo (Required))

RoleArn.description: IAM role ARN (Used by: GetDelegatedAccessToken (Required), GetWebIdentityToken (Required))

DurationSeconds.description: Token lifetime in seconds (Used by: GetDelegatedAccessToken, GetFederationToken, GetSessionToken, GetWebIdentityToken)

DelegationTokenLifetimeSeconds.description: Delegated token lifetime in seconds (Used by: GetDelegatedAccessToken)

Name.description: Session or federation token name (Used by: GetFederationToken (Required))

Policy.description: IAM policy JSON string for the temporary credentials (Used by: GetFederationToken)

SerialNumber.description: MFA device serial number (Used by: GetSessionToken)

languageModelTools.name: SQSTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS SQS (Simple Queue Service) commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListQueues {command:'ListQueues', params:{}}. GetQueueUrl {command:'GetQueueUrl', params:{QueueName:'my-queue'}}. SendMessage {command:'SendMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', MessageBody:'text'}}. ReceiveMessage {command:'ReceiveMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', MaxNumberOfMessages:10}}. DeleteMessage {command:'DeleteMessage', params:{QueueUrl:'https://...', ReceiptHandle:'handle'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage SQS queues and send/receive messages

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

QueueUrl.description: Queue URL (Used by: ListDeadLetterSourceQueues (Required), ListQueueTags (Required), GetQueueAttributes (Required), SendMessage (Required), ReceiveMessage (Required), DeleteMessage (Required))

QueueNamePrefix.description: Queue name prefix filter (Used by: ListQueues)

QueueOwnerAWSAccountId.description: Queue owner AWS account ID (Used by: GetQueueUrl)

AttributeNames.description: List of attribute names to retrieve. Use ['All'] for all attributes. (Used by: GetQueueAttributes, ReceiveMessage)

DelaySeconds.description: Delay in seconds before message becomes available (Used by: SendMessage)

MessageDeduplicationId.description: Deduplication ID for FIFO queues (Used by: SendMessage)

MessageGroupId.description: Message group ID for FIFO queues (Used by: SendMessage)

MaxNumberOfMessages.description: Maximum number of messages to receive (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

VisibilityTimeout.description: Visibility timeout in seconds (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

WaitTimeSeconds.description: Long polling wait time in seconds (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

MessageAttributeNames.description: Message attribute names to retrieve (Used by: ReceiveMessage)

MaxResults.description: Maximum number of results (Used by: ListQueues, ListDeadLetterSourceQueues)

languageModelTools.name: EC2Tool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS EC2 read-only and info commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: DescribeInstances {command:'DescribeInstances', params:{InstanceIds:['i-123']}}. DescribeImages {command:'DescribeImages', params:{Owners:['self']}}. GetConsoleOutput {command:'GetConsoleOutput', params:{InstanceId:'i-123'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Query EC2 instances, images, networking, and console data

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Use native EC2 API field names (e.g., InstanceIds, Filters, Owners).

InstanceId.description: Single instance ID (Used by: GetConsoleOutput (Required), GetPasswordData (Required))

InstanceIds.description: List of instance IDs (Used by: DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus)

Filters.description: EC2 filter array with Name and Values[] (Used by: DescribeAddresses, DescribeAvailabilityZones, DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus, DescribeKeyPairs, DescribeSecurityGroups, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeSubnets, DescribeTags, DescribeVolumes, DescribeVpcs)

DryRun.description: Validate permissions without running the request (Used by: DescribeAddresses, DescribeAvailabilityZones, DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeInstanceStatus, DescribeKeyPairs, DescribeRegions, DescribeSecurityGroups, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeSubnets, DescribeTags, DescribeVolumes, DescribeVpcs)

MaxResults.description: Pagination: maximum results (Used by: DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeVolumes)

NextToken.description: Pagination token for next page (Used by: DescribeImages, DescribeInstances, DescribeSnapshots, DescribeVolumes)

languageModelTools.name: APIGatewayTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS API Gateway REST API commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: GetRestApis {command:'GetRestApis', params:{limit:25}}. GetResources {command:'GetResources', params:{restApiId:'abc'}}. GetMethod {command:'GetMethod', params:{restApiId:'abc', resourceId:'xyz', httpMethod:'GET'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Inspect API Gateway REST APIs, resources, stages, usage, and more

command.description: The API Gateway command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Use native API Gateway field names (e.g., restApiId, resourceId, httpMethod, limit, position).

restApiId.description: REST API identifier (Used by: GetAuthorizers (Required), GetBasePathMappings (Required), GetDeployments (Required), GetDocumentationParts (Required), GetDocumentationVersions (Required), GetGatewayResponses (Required), GetModels (Required), GetRequestValidators (Required), GetResources (Required), GetRestApi (Required), GetStages (Required))

resourceId.description: Resource ID (Used by: GetIntegration (Required), GetIntegrationResponse (Required), GetMethod (Required), GetResource (Required))

httpMethod.description: HTTP method (Used by: GetIntegration (Required), GetIntegrationResponse (Required), GetMethod (Required))

usagePlanId.description: Usage plan ID (Used by: GetUsagePlan (Required), GetUsagePlanKey (Required), GetUsagePlanKeys (Required))

keyId.description: Usage plan key ID (Used by: GetUsagePlanKey (Required), GetUsagePlanKeys (Required))

domainName.description: Custom domain name (Used by: GetDomainName (Required), GetBasePathMappings (Required), GetBasePathMapping (Required))

position.description: Pagination position token (Used by: GetApiKeys, GetAuthorizers, GetBasePathMappings, GetClientCertificates, GetDeployments, GetDocumentationParts, GetDocumentationVersions, GetDomainNames, GetModels, GetRequestValidators, GetResources, GetRestApis, GetStages, GetUsagePlanKeys, GetUsagePlans, GetVpcLinks)

limit.description: Maximum results for list operations (Used by: GetApiKeys, GetAuthorizers, GetBasePathMappings, GetClientCertificates, GetDeployments, GetDocumentationParts, GetDocumentationVersions, GetDomainNames, GetModels, GetRequestValidators, GetResources, GetRestApis, GetStages, GetUsagePlanKeys, GetUsagePlans, GetVpcLinks)

name.description: Common name filter (Used by: GetApiKeys, GetRestApis)

includeCredentials.description: Whether to include credentials (Used by: GetExport)

languageModelTools.name: RDSTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS RDS describe and log commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: DescribeDBInstances {command:'DescribeDBInstances', params:{DBInstanceIdentifier:'my-db'}}. DescribeDBClusters {command:'DescribeDBClusters', params:{}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Inspect Amazon RDS: instances, clusters, snapshots, parameters, logs

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Use RDS field names (e.g., DBInstanceIdentifier, DBClusterIdentifier, Marker, MaxRecords).

DBInstanceIdentifier.description: DB instance identifier (Used by: DescribeDBInstances, DescribeDBLogFiles (Required), DescribePendingMaintenanceActions, DownloadDBLogFilePortion (Required), DescribeValidDBInstanceModifications (Required))

DBClusterIdentifier.description: DB cluster identifier (Used by: DescribeDBClusters, DescribeDBClusterSnapshots, DescribeDBClusterAutomatedBackups)

DBParameterGroupName.description: DB parameter group name (Used by: DescribeDBParameterGroups)

EngineVersion.description: Database engine version (Used by: DescribeDBEngineVersions, DescribeOrderableDBInstanceOptions)

Marker.description: Pagination marker (Used by: DescribeDBInstances, DescribeDBClusters, DescribeDBSnapshots, etc)

MaxRecords.description: Maximum records (Used by: DescribeDBInstances, DescribeDBClusters, DescribeDBSnapshots, etc)

Filters.description: Filters for the request (Used by: DescribeDBInstances, DescribeDBClusters, DescribeDBSnapshots, etc)

languageModelTools.name: RDSDataTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute Amazon RDS Data API commands for Aurora Serverless and RDS with Data API enabled. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ExecuteStatement {command:'ExecuteStatement', params:{resourceArn:'arn:aws:rds:...', secretArn:'arn:aws:secretsmanager:...', database:'db', sql:'SELECT 1'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Run SQL and manage transactions via the RDS Data API

command.description: The RDS Data API command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Use Data API field names (e.g., resourceArn, secretArn, database, sql, transactionId, parameters).

resourceArn.description: ARN of the Aurora/RDS cluster (Used by: BatchExecuteStatement (Required), BeginTransaction (Required), CommitTransaction (Required), ExecuteStatement (Required), RollbackTransaction (Required))

secretArn.description: ARN of the Secrets Manager secret with credentials (Used by: BatchExecuteStatement (Required), BeginTransaction (Required), CommitTransaction (Required), ExecuteStatement (Required), RollbackTransaction (Required))

database.description: Database name (Used by: BatchExecuteStatement, BeginTransaction, CommitTransaction, ExecuteStatement, RollbackTransaction)

transactionId.description: Transaction ID (Used by: BatchExecuteStatement, CommitTransaction (Required), ExecuteStatement, RollbackTransaction (Required))

languageModelTools.name: CloudFormationTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS CloudFormation describe, list, get, and drift detection commands. ALWAYS provide params object.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Inspect stacks, resources, changesets, types, and drift

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Use CloudFormation field names (e.g., StackName, StackSetName, ChangeSetName, TypeName, NextToken, MaxResults).

StackName.description: Stack name or ID (Used by: DescribeStacks (Required), DescribeStackResources (Required), DescribeStackEvents (Required), DescribeStackDriftDetectionStatus (Required), GetStackPolicy (Required), GetTemplate (Required), GetTemplateSummary (Required), ListStackResources (Required), DetectStackDrift (Required))

StackSetName.description: Stack set name or ID (Used by: DescribeStackSet (Required), DescribeStackSetOperation (Required), ListStackSetAutoDeploymentTargets (Required), ListStackSetOperationResults (Required), ListStackSetOperations (Required), DetectStackSetDrift (Required), ListStackInstances (Required))

ChangeSetName.description: Change set name or ID (Used by: DescribeChangeSet (Required), ListChangeSets (Required))

TypeName.description: Resource type name (Used by: DescribeType (Required), ListTypeVersions (Required), DescribeTypeRegistration (Required))

NextToken.description: Pagination token (Used by: most List commands)

MaxResults.description: Maximum records to return (Used by: most List commands)

languageModelTools.name: S3FileOperationsTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute S3 file operations: UploadFile to upload one or multiple files, DownloadFile to download one or multiple files, UploadFolder to upload folders with preserved structure, DownloadFolder to download folders with preserved structure. ALWAYS provide params object.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Upload and download files and folders to/from S3 with folder structure preservation

command.description: The S3 file operation command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

Bucket.description: S3 bucket name (Used by: UploadFile (Required), DownloadFile (Required), UploadFolder (Required), DownloadFolder (Required))

LocalPaths.description: Array of local file or folder paths (Used by: UploadFile (Required), UploadFolder (Required))

S3Keys.description: Array of S3 object keys (Used by: DownloadFile (Required))

S3KeyPrefixes.description: Array of S3 key prefixes/folders (Used by: DownloadFolder (Required))

LocalDirectory.description: Local directory path to download to (Used by: DownloadFile (Required), DownloadFolder (Required))

S3KeyPrefix.description: S3 key prefix/folder to upload to (Used by: UploadFile, UploadFolder)

ContentType.description: MIME type for uploaded files (Used by: UploadFile)

PreserveStructure.description: Whether to preserve folder structure (Used by: DownloadFile, DownloadFolder, UploadFolder)

languageModelTools.name: SNSTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS SNS (Simple Notification Service) commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListTopics {command:'ListTopics', params:{}}. GetTopicAttributes {command:'GetTopicAttributes', params:{TopicArn:'arn:...'}}. Publish {command:'Publish', params:{TopicArn:'arn:...', Message:'hello'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage SNS topics, subscriptions, endpoints and publishing

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

phoneNumber.description: E.164 phone number (Used by: CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut (Required), Publish)

TopicArn.description: Topic ARN (Used by: GetTopicAttributes (Required), ListSubscriptionsByTopic (Required), Publish (Required))

languageModelTools.name: S3Tool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute S3 commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListObjectsV2 {command:'ListObjectsV2', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name'}}. PutObject {command:'PutObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path', Body:'content'}}. DeleteObject {command:'DeleteObject', params:{Bucket:'name', Key:'path'}}. CopyObject {command:'CopyObject', params:{Bucket:'name', CopySource:'/bucket/key', Key:'new-path'}}. OpenS3Explorer {command:'OpenS3Explorer', params:{Bucket:'bucket-name', Key:'optional/path/'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Execute S3 commands including read, write, delete operations, and open S3 Explorer view

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. For write operations ensure Bucket and Key are provided.

Bucket.description: Bucket name (Used by: HeadBucket (Required), HeadObject (Required), ListObjectsV2 (Required), ListObjectVersions (Required), GetBucketPolicy (Required), GetBucketNotificationConfiguration (Required), GetObject (Required), PutObject (Required), DeleteObject (Required), CopyObject (Required), SelectObjectContent (Required), OpenS3Explorer (Required))

Key.description: Object key path (Used by: HeadObject (Required), GetObject (Required), PutObject (Required), DeleteObject (Required), CopyObject (Required), SelectObjectContent (Required), OpenS3Explorer (Required))

CopySource.description: Source object path for copy command (Used by: CopyObject (Required))

Body.description: Object content as string or base64 (Used by: PutObject)

ContentType.description: MIME type for the object (Used by: PutObject)

Prefix.description: Filter objects by prefix path (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions, OpenS3Explorer)

Delimiter.description: Delimiter character for grouping keys, typically / (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions)

MaxKeys.description: Maximum number of keys to return (Used by: ListObjectsV2, ListObjectVersions)

ContinuationToken.description: Token for pagination from previous response (Used by: ListObjectsV2)

StartAfter.description: Start listing after this key name (Used by: ListObjectsV2)

VersionId.description: Specific version ID of object (Used by: HeadObject, GetObject, DeleteObject)

KeyMarker.description: Key marker for version pagination (Used by: ListObjectVersions)

VersionIdMarker.description: Version ID marker for pagination (Used by: ListObjectVersions)

Metadata.description: Custom metadata key-value pairs (Used by: PutObject, CopyObject)

MetadataDirective.description: How to handle metadata in CopyObject: COPY or REPLACE (Used by: CopyObject)

DownloadToTemp.description: Download file to temp folder and return local path (Used by: GetObject)

AsText.description: Return file content as text for analysis (Used by: GetObject)

Expression.description: SQL expression for querying object content (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

InputSerialization.description: Format of the input data (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

OutputSerialization.description: Format for output data (Used by: SelectObjectContent (Required))

languageModelTools.name: FileOperationsTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Perform file operations: ReadFile to read file content, ReadFileStream to get file metadata, ReadFileAsBase64 to read as Base64, GetFileInfo to get file statistics, ListFiles to list directory contents, ZipTextFile to create a zip archive of a file or directory.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Read and manage files with various encoding and format options

command.description: The file operation command to execute

params.description: Command parameters. ReadFile: {filePath, encoding?}. ReadFileStream: {filePath}. ReadFileAsBase64: {filePath}. GetFileInfo: {filePath}. ListFiles: {dirPath, recursive?}. ZipTextFile: {filePath, outputPath?}

filePath.description: File path (Used by: ReadFile (Required), ReadFileStream (Required), ReadFileAsBase64 (Required), GetFileInfo (Required), ZipTextFile (Required))

encoding.description: File encoding for ReadFile (Used by: ReadFile)

recursive.description: Recursively list files in subdirectories (Used by: ListFiles)

outputPath.description: Custom output path for zip file (Used by: ZipTextFile)

languageModelTools.name: CloudWatchLogTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute CloudWatch Logs commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: DescribeLogGroups {command:'DescribeLogGroups', params:{logGroupNamePrefix:'app'}}. DescribeLogStreams {command:'DescribeLogStreams', params:{logGroupName:'my-group'}}. GetLogEvents {command:'GetLogEvents', params:{logGroupName:'my-group', logStreamName:'stream', limit:50}}. OpenCloudWatchLogView {command:'OpenCloudWatchLogView', params:{logGroupName:'my-group', logStreamName:'optional-stream'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Query CloudWatch log groups, streams, events, and open log viewer

command.description: The CloudWatch Logs command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide logGroupName/logStreamName where needed.

logGroupNamePrefix.description: Prefix filter for log group names (Used by: DescribeLogGroups)

logGroupName.description: Target log group name (Used by: DescribeLogStreams (Required), GetLogEvents (Required), OpenCloudWatchLogView (Required))

logStreamNamePrefix.description: Prefix filter for log stream names (Used by: DescribeLogStreams)

descending.description: Whether to sort descending for DescribeLogStreams (Used by: DescribeLogStreams)

limit.description: Maximum items to return where supported (Used by: DescribeLogGroups, DescribeLogStreams, GetLogEvents)

nextToken.description: Pagination token (Used by: DescribeLogGroups, DescribeLogStreams, GetLogEvents)

logStreamName.description: Target log stream name (Used by: GetLogEvents (Required), OpenCloudWatchLogView)

startTime.description: Start time in epoch milliseconds (Used by: GetLogEvents)

endTime.description: End time in epoch milliseconds (Used by: GetLogEvents)

startFromHead.description: Return events starting from the beginning of the stream (Used by: GetLogEvents)

languageModelTools.name: LambdaTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Lambda commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListFunctions {command:'ListFunctions', params:{MaxItems:10}}. GetFunction {command:'GetFunction', params:{FunctionName:'my-function'}}. Invoke {command:'Invoke', params:{FunctionName:'my-function', Payload:'{"key":"value"}'}}
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and invoke AWS Lambda functions

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty.

FunctionName.description: Lambda function name or ARN (Used by: GetFunction (Required), GetFunctionConfiguration (Required), UpdateFunctionCode (Required), Invoke (Required))

Qualifier.description: Function version or alias (Used by: GetFunction, GetFunctionConfiguration, Invoke)

FunctionVersion.description: Set to ALL to include all versions (Used by: ListFunctions)

Marker.description: Pagination marker from previous response (Used by: ListFunctions)

MaxItems.description: Maximum number of functions to return (Used by: ListFunctions)

MasterRegion.description: For Lambda@Edge, the AWS Region of the master function (Used by: ListFunctions)

ZipFile.description: Base64-encoded zip file containing function code (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

S3Bucket.description: S3 bucket containing the function code (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

S3Key.description: S3 object key for the function code (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

ImageUri.description: URI of a container image in Amazon ECR (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

Publish.description: Publish a new version after updating code (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

DryRun.description: Validate the request without updating code (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

RevisionId.description: Update only if revision ID matches (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

Architectures.description: Instruction set architecture: x86_64 or arm64 (Used by: UpdateFunctionCode)

Resource.description: Function ARN (Used by: ListTags (Required), TagResource (Required), UntagResource (Required))

Tags.description: Key-value pairs for tags (Used by: TagResource (Required))

TagKeys.description: Tag keys to remove (Used by: UntagResource (Required))

LogType.description: Set to Tail to include execution log in response (Used by: Invoke)

ClientContext.description: Base64-encoded client context data (Used by: Invoke)

Payload.description: JSON string payload to pass to function (Used by: Invoke)

languageModelTools.name: StepFuncTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Step Functions commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListStateMachines {command:'ListStateMachines', params:{maxResults:10}}. StartExecution {command:'StartExecution', params:{stateMachineArn:'arn:aws:states:...', input:'{\"key\":\"value\"}'}}. DescribeExecution {command:'DescribeExecution', params:{executionArn:'arn:aws:states:...'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and run AWS Step Functions state machines

command.description: The Step Functions command to execute

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide stateMachineArn/executionArn as needed.

stateMachineArn.description: State machine ARN (Used by: DescribeStateMachine (Required), ListExecutions, StartExecution (Required), UpdateStateMachine (Required))

maxResults.description: Maximum items to return where supported (Used by: ListExecutions, ListStateMachines)

statusFilter.description: Filter executions by status (Used by: ListExecutions)

input.description: JSON string input for execution (Used by: StartExecution)

definition.description: State machine definition in Amazon States Language (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

roleArn.description: IAM role ARN for the state machine (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

publish.description: Set true to publish a new version (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

versionDescription.description: Description for the published version (Used by: UpdateStateMachine)

languageModelTools.name: GlueTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS Glue commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListJobs {command:'ListJobs', params:{MaxResults:10}}. CreateJob {command:'CreateJob', params:{Name:'my-job', Role:'arn:aws:iam::...:role/...', Command:{Name:'glueetl'}}}. StartJobRun {command:'StartJobRun', params:{JobName:'my-job'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage and run AWS Glue ETL jobs and triggers

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide Name/JobName/ResourceArn as needed.

Name.description: Job or trigger name (Used by: CreateJob (Required), GetTrigger (Required), StartJobRun (Required))

JobName.description: Job name (Used by: GetJob (Required), GetJobRun (Required), GetJobRuns (Required), StartJobRun (Required))

LogUri.description: S3 URI for job logs (Used by: CreateJob)

Timeout.description: Job timeout in minutes (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

MaxCapacity.description: Maximum capacity for DPU units (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

NumberOfWorkers.description: Number of workers (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

SecurityConfiguration.description: Security configuration name (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

nextToken.description: Pagination token (Used by: GetJobRuns, GetTriggers, ListJobs, ListTriggers)

MaxResults.description: Maximum items to return (Used by: GetJobRuns, GetTriggers, ListJobs, ListTriggers)

DependencyJobName.description: Filter by dependency job name (Used by: GetTriggers)

DependentJobName.description: Filter by dependent job name (Used by: ListTriggers)

languageModelTools.name: EMRTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Describe and list EMR clusters, steps, studios, notebook executions, release labels, and security settings. Commands are read-only: DescribeCluster, DescribeJobFlows, DescribeNotebookExecution, DescribePersistentAppUI, DescribeReleaseLabel, DescribeSecurityConfiguration, DescribeStep, DescribeStudio, GetAutoTerminationPolicy, GetBlockPublicAccessConfiguration, GetClusterSessionCredentials, GetManagedScalingPolicy, GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL, GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL, GetStudioSessionMapping, ListBootstrapActions, ListClusters, ListInstanceFleets, ListInstanceGroups, ListInstances, ListNotebookExecutions, ListReleaseLabels, ListSecurityConfigurations, ListSteps, ListStudios, ListStudioSessionMappings, ListSupportedInstanceTypes.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Inspect EMR clusters, notebooks, steps, studios, and related configurations

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide ClusterId, StudioId, ReleaseLabel, or other identifiers as needed.

ClusterId.description: EMR cluster ID (Used by: DescribeCluster (Required), GetAutoTerminationPolicy (Required), GetManagedScalingPolicy (Required), ListBootstrapActions (Required), ListInstanceFleets (Required), ListInstanceGroups (Required), ListInstances (Required), ListSteps (Required), GetClusterSessionCredentials (Required))

JobFlowIds.description: Job flow IDs filter (Used by: DescribeJobFlows)

StudioId.description: Studio ID (Used by: DescribeStudio (Required), GetStudioSessionMapping (Required), ListStudioSessionMappings (Required))

ApplicationId.description: Application ID for UI presigned URL commands (Used by: GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL (Required), GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL (Required))

IdentityType.description: Identity type (USER or GROUP) (Used by: GetStudioSessionMapping (Required), ListStudioSessionMappings (Required))

CreatedAfter.description: ISO date string filter (Used by: ListClusters, DescribeJobFlows, ListNotebookExecutions)

CreatedBefore.description: ISO date string filter (Used by: ListClusters, DescribeJobFlows, ListNotebookExecutions)

MaxResults.description: Maximum items to return where supported (Used by: list operations)

languageModelTools.name: IAMTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute AWS IAM commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: GetRole {command:'GetRole', params:{RoleName:'my-role'}}. ListAttachedRolePolicies {command:'ListAttachedRolePolicies', params:{RoleName:'my-role'}}. GetPolicyVersion {command:'GetPolicyVersion', params:{PolicyArn:'arn:aws:iam::123:policy/p', VersionId:'v1'}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Inspect IAM roles and policies

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide RoleName/PolicyArn as needed.

RoleName.description: Target IAM role name (Used by: GetRole (Required), GetRolePolicy (Required), ListAttachedRolePolicies (Required), ListRolePolicies (Required), ListRoleTags (Required))

PathPrefix.description: Path prefix filter (Used by: ListRoles, ListPolicies, ListAttachedRolePolicies)

Marker.description: Pagination marker (Used by: ListRoles, ListPolicies, ListAttachedRolePolicies, ListRolePolicies, ListPolicyVersions)

MaxItems.description: Maximum items to return (Used by: ListRoles, ListPolicies, ListAttachedRolePolicies, ListRolePolicies, ListPolicyVersions)

PolicyArn.description: IAM policy ARN (Used by: GetPolicy (Required), GetPolicyVersion (Required), ListPolicyVersions (Required), ListAttachedRolePolicies (Required))

Scope.description: Scope filter for ListPolicies (Used by: ListPolicies)

OnlyAttached.description: Set true to list only attached policies (Used by: ListPolicies)

PolicyUsageFilter.description: Filter policies by usage (Used by: ListPolicies)

languageModelTools.name: DynamoDBTool
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Execute DynamoDB commands. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: ListTables {command:'ListTables', params:{Limit:10}}. DescribeTable {command:'DescribeTable', params:{TableName:'my-table'}}. Query {command:'Query', params:{TableName:'my-table', KeyConditionExpression:'pk = :pk', ExpressionAttributeValues:{':pk':{'S':'id'}}}}.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage DynamoDB tables and items

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide TableName and key attributes where needed.

TableName.description: Target DynamoDB table name (Used by: DescribeTable (Required), CreateTable (Required), DeleteTable (Required), Query (Required), Scan (Required), PutItem (Required), UpdateItem (Required), DeleteItem (Required), GetItem (Required), UpdateTable (Required), UpdateTimeToLive (Required))

Limit.description: Maximum number of items to return (Used by: ListTables, Query, Scan)

ExclusiveStartTableName.description: Pagination start table name (Used by: ListTables)

ExpressionAttributeValues.description: Expression attribute values map (Used by: Query, Scan, UpdateItem, PutItem, DeleteItem)

ExpressionAttributeNames.description: Expression attribute names map (Used by: Query, Scan, UpdateItem, PutItem, DeleteItem, CreateTable)

IndexName.description: Secondary index name (Used by: Query, Scan)

Key.description: Primary key map (Used by: GetItem (Required), DeleteItem (Required), UpdateItem (Required))

AttributeUpdates.description: Legacy attribute updates map (Used by: UpdateItem)

ConditionExpression.description: Condition expression (Used by: PutItem, UpdateItem, DeleteItem)

ProvisionedThroughput.description: Provisioned throughput config (Used by: CreateTable, UpdateTable)

BillingMode.description: Billing mode: PROVISIONED or PAY_PER_REQUEST (Used by: CreateTable, UpdateTable)

awsflow.mcp.enabled.description: Enable the MCP stdio host. When disabled, MCP sessions cannot be started.

awsflow.mcp.host.description: Host interface for the MCP bridge server.

awsflow.mcp.port.description: TCP port for the MCP bridge server.

awsflow.mcp.sessionCap.description: Maximum concurrent MCP stdio sessions. Additional requests queue until a slot is free.

awsflow.mcp.disabledTools.description: List of tool names to disable for MCP sessions (independent from Service Access settings).

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run lint && node ./out/test/runTest.js
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run typecheck && npm run build:prod
